data.title: Daniel Nestor Launches Online Tennis Course for Doubles Players
data.meta_description: Daniel Nestor takes on a coaching role in his new online tennis course for doubles players. In collaboration with Zest Media Productions in Vancouver, Nestor uses video based learning to make this online tennis instruction series widely accessible, and share the knowledge he’s gained over his 28-yea
data.text:
“Mastering Doubles with Daniel Nestor” eLearning Course

Decorated Canadian tennis legend and Hall-of-Famer, Daniel Nestor released his first online educational course “Mastering Doubles with Daniel Nestor” in collaboration with Zest Media Productions and Budimac Tennis Group in the fall of 2023.

After retiring from a successful 28-year professional career on the ATP Tour in 2018, Daniel has dedicated much of his time and energy to educating promising up-and-comers athletes, and tennis enthusiasts alike.

Through video based learning, this online tennis instruction series aims to give a wider audience the opportunity to learn from one of the sport’s greats. In the 90-minute course, Daniel shares many of his secrets that helped contribute to his longstanding and respected career. He breaks down several realistic in-game scenarios and drills that students can take with them to the court to start leveling up their game.

Unlike other sports courses found online, Daniel Nestor’s is strictly focused on doubles tennis, where students can practice on their own or with a partner - covering the mental, tactical and technical strategies that led to him winning 91 men’s doubles titles.

What should students expect from the course?

After signing up, students will gain access to 36 video lessons and seven unique modules - each focused on specific aspects of the doubles tennis game. From learning techniques to help you improve your serve, to exercises that work towards developing the mindset of a champion, Daniel shares his personal and highly-valuable strategies that he implemented throughout his successful professional career.

This course is designed to help doubles players at all playing levels improve their skills and get past the learning plateau. It's common to feel stuck in your playing ability. Daniel's flagship course is aimed at helping you advance past this stage with his pro-level strategies, techniques and exercises.

Students can expect to gain insights into areas such as:

How to communicate effectively with your partner

How to position yourself on the court

How to serve and return with confidence

How to execute winning shots and strategies

How to handle pressure and nerves

This is a special opportunity to learn from a master who has played with and against some of the greatest players in history, such as Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic. In fact, in 2023, the National Bank Open also renamed their trophy the “Daniel Nestor Trophy” in honour of Nestor’s commitment to tennis in Canada.

Visit danielnestortennis.com now to learn more about the course!

Are you looking to create online courses?

There are many educational video production companies in Canada and the US, but finding one you can fully trust to bring your video masterclass, online course or lecture series to fruition can be challenging.

These video-based eLearning projects tend to be very large in scale - requiring a reliable, experienced, organized & creative video production partner to help you execute it in a timely and high-quality manner.

For example, Daniel Nestor’s tennis course was a large project that required a lot of planning, time management and creativity to execute effectively and efficiently. But, that’s what we love to do! If you’re looking for someone to help you produce online video courses, we’d love to hear from you.

Need a bit of a professional advice for your next video project?
